title: Exploration and Definition: Commercial Changes for Juniper MIST SD LAN/WiFi Q1/23
description:
Description
As an Offeringmanager 
I want to enable my Servicemanager/Accounter/Engineer to make  commercial changes of an existing SD-LAN/WiFi network fully automated.
Contact persons: 
Business Epic Owner: Kaspar DÃ¼tting
Business Owner Stefan Jung
CPDM: Florian Skirl
Sales: Wilhelm Niemeier - Responsibilities are currently being clarified
   Business Value: high (low/medium/high)
Changes:

Business Scope:
Customer can have changes (i.e. additional SD Service Points) within an existing contract. These changes can be done with an existing SD-LAN/WiFi network in operation.

These changes may have an impact on the commercial value of the contract and therefore can make it necessary to negotiate it once again with the client.
acceptance_criteria: Data requirements analysis for commercial changes
